name: Power Surge (Kometh)
description:
Power Surge is a battery-rolling game made exclusively for Nokia Jam 3.

The goal is simple: make the cube-shaped battery connect with a socket by rolling it from one side to another. Be careful, though: every move drains the battery's power!

Note: I didn't have much time to finish this game, so unfortunately Power Surge only has five levels and almost no sound effects. I wish I could do this game justice, the concept is quite fun!

Controls:

  1. Arrow keys or WASD to roll the battery up/left/down/right
  2. R to restart a level
